summary: This document outlines the addition of beneficiaries to the Butterfly Trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein. It details the roles of the trustees and the process by which beneficiaries can be added under the Trust Agreement. The document includes multiple instances of beneficiary additions and the acknowledgment of the trustees.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is identified as the Grantor of the Butterfly Trust, which he established.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Indyke is one of the trustees of the Butterfly Trust and is involved in the addition of beneficiaries.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Kahn serves as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust and participates in the decision to add beneficiaries.

persons.name: Harry I. Beller
persons.context: Beller is identified as a current acting trustee of the Butterfly Trust and is involved in adding beneficiaries.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Kellerhals is a current acting trustee of the Butterfly Trust and is involved in the addition of beneficiaries.

persons.name: Karyna Shuliak
persons.context: Shuliak is mentioned as a new beneficiary being added to the Butterfly Trust.

connections.description: Epstein is the Grantor of the Butterfly Trust, and Indyke serves as one of the trustees.
Epstein is the Grantor of the Butterfly Trust, and Kahn serves as one of the trustees.

events.title: Addition of Beneficiaries to Butterfly Trust
events.description: Harry I. Beller and Erika A. Kellerhals, as acting trustees, add Karyna Shuliak as a beneficiary to the Butterfly Trust.

events.title: Trustee Acknowledgment
events.description: Harry I. Beller and Erika A. Kellerhals acknowledge their roles as trustees in the addition of beneficiaries.

keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust was established by Jeffrey E. Epstein on December 27, 2006.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn are named as trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Harry I. Beller and Erika A. Kellerhals are current acting trustees involved in adding beneficiaries.
Karyna Shuliak is added as a beneficiary to the Butterfly Trust.
The document includes multiple instances of beneficiary additions and trustee acknowledgments.
